alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lincoln; Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 12:24AM CDT until November 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Eastern Union Parish in north central Louisiana... Ouachita Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1223 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of West Crossett to 6 miles east of Farmerville to 12 miles southeast of Ruston, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Sterlington, Marion, Downsville, Drew, Haile, Millhaven, Folksville, Rocky Branch, Mineral Springs, Guthrie, Deshard, Fairbanks and Perryville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Arkansas...and north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central Arkansas...and north central Louisiana.
